name: Titled Game 1.0
description:
Titled Game is a single player game where you can wall run, jump around and grapple onto objects in the map. If you fall down to the bottom of the map, you will be spawned back to the start, so be careful.

Controls:

-WASD to move

-LMB (Left mouse button) to shoot your grappling

-Left Shift to slow down time
